TopicTitle: Thank you everyone for coming together.

Articles.Content:
I just posted this to say a BIG THANK YOU to everyone over the last few days since 0.2 was released..

I don't think I have ever seen a community come together to help fix/tweak/update/patch all our modders mods that 0.2 broke..

Everywhere I look around these forums I see people helping others by supplying temp links to mods converted to work with 0.2 that the modders themselves haven't had time to update or mods that are not being maintained anymore...

Also to the modders themselves, thank you for all your hard work in starting to get your mods converted after being broken, I'm not a modder myself, but I can imagine the heartbreak you must have felt when you discovered that most of your mods wouldn't work any more..

KSP and everyone that belongs to it are by far the greatest bunch of people I have ever had the privilege to be associated with..

THANK you ALL..
It just shows that we have some kind, smart and completely awesome people populating this universe. Its wonderful to see.
well I just simply can not imagine a douche rocket scientist
No one can go to space on his own. No one can survive there alone. It's only healthy logic to help each other
